cards.title: Gyrosaur
powers: If you have at least 2 crash cards in your hand, {Gyrosaur} deals up to 3 targets 1 melee damage each. If not, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
One target with more than 10 HP deals itself 3 melee damage.
Select a non-character target. Increase damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: We're here to stop you! Although, I usually find stopping to be the hard part.
openingLines.TheSetList: Um, sorry about that. I'll try to be gentler when I run you all over this time.

cards.title: A Merry Chase
body: Whenever a target deals damage to {Gyrosaur}, all other hero targets become immune to damage dealt by that target until this card leaves play.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Get after it! The{BR}boss wants that troublesome{BR}pinball for her collection.

cards.title: Gyro Stabilizer
body: When this card enters play, discard up to 3 cards. Draw as many cards as you discarded this way.
Whenever you evaluate the number of Crash cards in your hand, you may treat it as being 1 higher or 1 lower than it is.

flavorQuotes.text: I do machines. I'm{BR}pretty good at them.

cards.title: Hidden Detour
body: When this card enters play, {Gyrosaur} regains 2 HP. Then, reveal the top card of the environment deck and place it beneath this card.
Cards beneath this one are not considered in play. When an environment card would enter play, you may first switch it with the card beneath this one.

flavorQuotes.text: There's a faster way that{BR}is also much less scary.

cards.title: Hyperspin
body: When this card enters play, you may play a card.
Increase damage dealt by {Gyrosaur} to non-hero targets by 1.
If you would draw a Crash card, play it instead. Then, destroy all other copies of Hyperspin and this card.

flavorQuotes.text: We need someone on the inside.{BR}Someone even faster than me.

cards.flavorReference: Talin Brosk, Space Race: Start Your Engine

cards.title: Indiscriminate Pass
body: If you have at least 1 Crash card in your hand, {Gyrosaur} deals another hero target 2 melee damage.
{Gyrosaur} deals 1 non-hero target 4 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: This. This is why I work alone.

cards.title: Omnivore
body: Destroy a target with 3 or fewer HP.
{Gyrosaur} regains X HP, where X is the HP of that target before it was destroyed.
You may shuffle your trash into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Last time you{BR}ran away from it.

cards.title: On a Roll
body: At the end of your turn, draw a card. Then if you have at least 2 Crash cards in your hand, {Gyrosaur} deals each non-hero target 1 melee damage and this card is destroyed.

flavorQuotes.text: Guess you won't need me to{BR}arrange ground transport.

cards.title: Protective Escort
body: Draw 2 cards.
Select a target and a damage type. That target is immune to that damage type until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Rapturian Shell
cards.body: At the end of your turn, if you have 0 Crash cards in your hand, {Gyrosaur} deals 1 other hero 2 psychic damage.
powers: Play a Crash card, or discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a Crash card and put it into your hand.
cards.flavorText: The turtle blinked. “I didn't{BR}come from these sewers. I'm from{BR}space.” Quicksilver just stared.

cards.title: Read the Terrain
cards.body: At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck and replace or discard it.
powers: If {Gyrosaur} deals no damage this turn, increase damage dealt by {Gyrosaur} during your next turn to non-hero targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: It's best to plan ahead. I{BR}don't want to get lost. Again.

cards.title: Reckless Alien Racing Tortoise
cards.body: During your turn, the first time you have more than 3 Crash cards in your hand, immediately use this card's power and then destroy it.
powers: {Gyrosaur} deals 1 target X+1 melee damage, where X is the number of Crash cards in your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Today is my impulsive day. I{BR}know because it's Wednesday.

cards.title: Ricochet
body: {Gyrosaur} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. {Gyrosaur} deals a second target X melee damage, where X is the amount of damage she dealt to the first target.
Reduce the next damage dealt by non-hero targets damaged this way to 0.

flavorQuotes.text: It's that guy's fault{BR}for being so bouncy.

cards.title: Sphere of Devastation
body: Discard all Crash cards in your hand. {Gyrosaur} deals 1 target X+4 melee damage, where X is 4 times the number of cards discarded this way.
If {Gyrosaur} dealt more than 10 damage this way, destroy all environment cards and each other player discards a card.

flavorQuotes.text: What are you going to do?

cards.title: Terrifying Momentum
body: {Gyrosaur} deals 1 target X+2 melee damage, where X is the number of Crash cards in your hand.
If X is more than 4, redirect this damage to the non-hero target with the lowest HP.
Draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Wherever I end up, pretend{BR}that's where I was aiming.

cards.title: Wipeout
body: {Gyrosaur} deals up to X+1 targets 4 melee damage each, then deals herself X+1 melee damage, where X is the number of Crash cards in your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Stopping was{BR}supposed to be the easy part.{BR}Can someone help me up?

cards.title: Wrecking Ball
body: When this card enters play, {Gyrosaur} deals each target 1 melee damage.
Increase damage dealt to environment targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Sorry about your wall.{BR}And ceiling. And your floor.

promoCards.title: Gyrosaur
powers: If at least half of the cards in your hand are crash cards, draw a card. If not, play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
One player with fewer than 4 cards in their hand may play 2 cards now.
Reduce the next damage dealt to a hero target by 2.

promoCards.title: Gyrosaur
powers: Discard a card. If it was a crash card, {Gyrosaur} regains 2 HP. Otherwise, she deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
Each hero with fewer than 2 non-character cards in play may use a power now.
Targets cannot regain HP until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: This situation calls for being sneaky!
openingLines.TheSetList: Wait, you can see me? I was being sneaky.

promoCards.title: Gyrosaur
powers: Put the top card of your deck beneath {Gyrosaur}, face up. When she deals damage, play or draw it.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
One hero may use a power now.
Select a target. Increase the next damage dealt to it by 2.

openingLines.default: Arr! Avast!... What else do cursed pirates say?
openingLines.TheSetList: Prepare to board them, me hearties!
